EmailTemplate.subject: Good News - Link to HDA is Repaired
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear HDA User, Good news - the link from the Honeywell MyAerospace Portal to the Honeywell Diagnostic Application (HDA) has been repaired.
Thank you for your patience and we apologize for the inconvenience.
Thank you for your business, Honeywell Aerospace Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/a0200q0kiQ0b00DXsIZciiG]]>
